strapiPost.title: Holiday Makers Market In Fayetteville
strapiPost.content:
There’s never a shortage of makers markets in Northwest Arkansas around the holidays. 

  • Shop: The Community Creative Center’s (CCC) Holiday Market is happening through Dec. 18 at the Walton Arts Center’s Nadine Baum Studios. The market has all sorts of unique handmade items by local artists ready to be Christmas gifts. 
  • Making art: The CCC hosts classes, workshops, and events year round and even offers artists residencies to further their crafts and develop professionally in the region. 

For more info about the CCC’s Holiday Market, click HERE.
